Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.pologov.implementor

Class Implementor

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.pologov.implementor.Implementor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Impler, JarImpler
public class Implementor extends Object implements JarImpler, Impler
Class implementing JarImpler and Impler Class can create a class and their jar archives
See Also:
  • JarImpler
  • Impler

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Entry point of class. Using the command line, it can group the implementation of an interface into a specified path. As well as a jar archive of this implementation.
      Parameters:
      args - is array of arguments it two arguments execute Impler it three arguments execute JarImpler else print in err errors

    • implement

      public void implement(Class<?> token, Path root) throws ImplerException
      Implements class by interface and path. Generates class, which implements interface token. And writes that class into root path.
      Specified by:
      implement in interface Impler
      Parameters:
      token - the interface to be implemented
      root - the path in which the generated file should lie
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if:
      • token is null
      • token is not interface
      • token is private interface
      • can't create output dir for root
      • can't open class for writing

    • getPath

      private Path getPath(Class<?> token, Path root, String fileName)
      Generate the path to the filename file passing through root implementing token.
      Parameters:
      token - the class that needs to be implemented
      root - the path in which this class should be
      fileName - the file name of that class with extension
      Returns:
      the path in which the generated class lies

      Returns:

      private int validateModifies(int modifiers)

      Parameters:
      modifiers - given modifiers
      Returns:
      good modifiers is not Modifier.TRANSIENT and Modifier.ABSTRACT

      Returns:

      Returns:

    • implementJar

      public void implementJar(Class<?> token, Path jarFile) throws ImplerException
      Implements class by interface and path in jar file. Generates a class that implements the interface token. And will write this jar archive of this class to the root path.
      Specified by:
      implementJar in interface JarImpler
      Parameters:
      token - the interface to be implemented
      jarFile - the path in which the generated jar archive should lie
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if:
      • token is null
      • token is not interface
      • token is private interface
      • can't compile jar archive
      • can't open class for writing or can't find path

    • compile

      private void compile(Class<?> token, Path compilePath, Path path) throws ImplerException
      Compile jar file.
      Parameters:
      token - the interface to be implemented
      compilePath - path where jar file will be lie
      path - path where generate java class was lie
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if
